item.title: Anaesthetist

item.title: Dear Future Historians…
item.description: [[songs/w/wovenwar/wovenwar/matter_of_time.md#we-fight-to-conceal-the-truth-but-its-all-a-matter-of-time-vyl-wnanory|I never walked on the moon]] [[songs/w/wovenwar/wovenwar/matter_of_time.md#we-fight-to-conceal-the-truth-but-its-all-a-matter-of-time-vyl-wnanory|I never saw the pyramids]] [[songs/w/wovenwar/wovenwar/matter_of_time.md#we-fight-to-conceal-the-truth-but-its-all-a-matter-of-time-vyl-wnanory|I was never struck by famine or fortune]] [[songs/t/the_xx/xx/islands.

item.title: Myopia
item.description: [[songs/g/graveyard/hisingen_blues/rss.md#theres-no-bottom-when-i-run-vyl-wnanory|Drip, drip, drop, bit by bit]] [[songs/g/graveyard/hisingen_blues/rss.md#theres-no-bottom-when-i-run-vyl-wnanory|It’s the dulcet sound of the glacial melt]] [[songs/g/graveyard/hisingen_blues/rss.md#theres-no-bottom-when-i-run-vyl-wnanory|Accompanied by the Beluga]] [[songs/g/graveyard/hisingen_blues/rss.md#theres-no-bottom-when-i-run-vyl-wnanory|Singing about the hand they’ve been dealt]] [[songs/g/graveyard/hisingen_blues/rss.

item.title: Never Let Go Of The Microscope
item.description: [[songs/r/rise_against/the_black_market/a_beautiful_indifference.md#we-learn-to-stand-up-and-just-to-walk-away-vyl-wnanory|Like Socrates I only graze on the slopes]] [[songs/r/rise_against/the_black_market/a_beautiful_indifference.md#we-learn-to-stand-up-and-just-to-walk-away-vyl-wnanory|Of the summit of my own ignorance]] [[songs/r/rise_against/the_black_market/a_beautiful_indifference.md#we-learn-to-stand-up-and-just-to-walk-away-vyl-wnanory|Like Hippocrates I can affirm that the method of science]] [[songs/r/rise_against/the_black_market/a_beautiful_indifference.

item.title: The Appeal & The Mindsweep I
item.description: [[songs/r/rage_against_the_machine/the_battle_of_los_angeles/sleep_now_in_the_fire.md#sleep-now-in-the-fire-vyl-wnanory|This is an appeal to the struggling and striving]] [[songs/r/rage_against_the_machine/the_battle_of_los_angeles/sleep_now_in_the_fire.md#sleep-now-in-the-fire-vyl-wnanory|stakeholders of this planet, this floating rock we call Earth.]] [[songs/r/rage_against_the_machine/the_battle_of_los_angeles/sleep_now_in_the_fire.

item.title: The Bank Of England
item.description: [[songs/x/x/aint_love_grand/burning_house_of_love.md#burning-there-for-love-vyl-wnanory|I refuse to notice the wind or the rain]] [[songs/x/x/aint_love_grand/burning_house_of_love.md#burning-there-for-love-vyl-wnanory|To teach me of nature would be done in vain]] [[songs/x/x/aint_love_grand/burning_house_of_love.

item.title: The Last Garrison
item.description: Can you hear the war-cry? The adrenaline bursts through the riverbanks Welcome to the skirmish I can’t feel my legs Give me morphine Give me morphine Give me more!

item.title: The One True Colour
item.description: [[songs/h/heaven_shall_burn/iconoclast_part_1__the_final_resistance/murderers_of_all_murderers.md#the-one-you-hope-for-the-one-you-wait-for-vyl-wnanory|As one child is taught red on his mother’s knee (the one true colour)]] [[songs/h/heaven_shall_burn/iconoclast_part_1__the_final_resistance/murderers_of_all_murderers.md#the-one-you-hope-for-the-one-you-wait-for-vyl-wnanory|A neighbour is taught blue on his mother’s knee (the one true colour)]] [[songs/h/heaven_shall_burn/iconoclast_part_1__the_final_resistance/murderers_of_all_murderers.

item.title: Torn Apart
item.description: [[songs/p/parkway_drive/atlas/swing.md#there-is-no-such-thing-as-different-shades-of-truth-vyl-wnanory|A naked eye conspires with fear]] [[songs/p/parkway_drive/atlas/swing.md#there-is-no-such-thing-as-different-shades-of-truth-vyl-wnanory|To form an idea]] [[songs/p/parkway_drive/atlas/swing.md#there-is-no-such-thing-as-different-shades-of-truth-vyl-wnanory|So destructive and insincere]] [[songs/p/pendulum/in_silico/the_other_side.md#theres-nothing-nothing-to-fear-to-fear-your-saviours-your-saviours-are-here-are-here-vyl-wnanory|Reared in the mind]] [[songs/p/pendulum/in_silico/the_other_side.
